title: How to Uninstall the Facebook App on Android

steps.title: Open Settings .
steps.content: Open Settings . It's the icon that resembles a gray gear usually located in your Android's app drawer, though the icon may look different depending on the theme you're using on your Android phone. This might be your only option to get rid of Facebook, especially if you're a Samsung user. This app comes pre-installed on many Samsung phones and can only be disabled instead of uninstalled.

steps.title: Tap Apps.
steps.content: Tap Apps . It's next to the icon with dots in the shape of a square and will display a list of all your installed apps .

steps.title: Tap Facebook.
steps.content: Tap Facebook . It's next to the blue Facebook logo with the white lowercase "f" and tapping this will display the Application Information page for the Facebook app.

steps.title: Tap Disable.
steps.content: Tap Disable . The app will be disabled and act like it has been uninstalled. To re-enable this app, you can return here and tap Enable or open the app and update it.

steps.title: Open Setting .
steps.content: Open Setting . It's the icon that resembles a gray gear usually located in your Android's app drawer, though the icon may look different depending on the theme you're using on your Android phone.

steps.title: Tap Apps.
steps.content: Tap Apps . It's next to the icon with dots in the shape of a square. This will display a list of all your installed apps.

steps.title: Tap Facebook.
steps.content: Tap Facebook . It's next to the blue Facebook logo with the white lowercase "f". All the apps installed on your Android device are listed in alphabetical order. This will display the Application Information page for the Facebook app.

steps.title: Tap Uninstall.
steps.content: Tap Uninstall . It's the first option below the title at the top of the page. This will prompt a pop-up window asking if you want to uninstall the app.

steps.title: Tap Ok.
steps.content: Tap Ok . It's in the bottom-right corner of the pop-up window. This will uninstall the Facebook app.
